verbs.description: As [ARG0: he] [V: met] [ARG1: with French counterpart Emmanuel Macron] , President Trump abruptly dismissed a question Tuesday about whether or not he is considering a pardon for personal attorney Michael Cohen . " Stupid question , " Trump told a reporter during a photo opportunity with Macron .

[ARGM-TMP: As he met with French counterpart Emmanuel Macron] , [ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-MNR: abruptly] [V: dismissed] [ARG1: a question] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [C-ARG1: about whether or not he is considering a pardon for personal attorney Michael Cohen] . " Stupid question , " Trump told a reporter during a photo opportunity with Macron .

As he met with French counterpart Emmanuel Macron , President Trump abruptly dismissed a question Tuesday about whether or not he [V: is] considering a pardon for personal attorney Michael Cohen . " Stupid question , " Trump told a reporter during a photo opportunity with Macron .

As he met with French counterpart Emmanuel Macron , President Trump abruptly dismissed a question Tuesday about whether or not [ARG0: he] is [V: considering] [ARG1: a pardon for personal attorney Michael Cohen] . " Stupid question , " Trump told a reporter during a photo opportunity with Macron .

As he met with French counterpart Emmanuel Macron , President Trump abruptly dismissed a question Tuesday about whether or not he is considering a pardon for personal attorney Michael Cohen . " Stupid question , " [ARG0: Trump] [V: told] [ARG2: a reporter] [ARGM-TMP: during a photo opportunity with Macron] .
